entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 March 2023
